Zhengyun Dou 
Seattle WA 98101 
(206) 841-5186 | douzhengyun@gmail.com 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
 
Seasoned Data Scientist with extensive experience in deploying solutions using 
machine learning (classification, clustering, prediction, etc.),  
deep learning (RNN, CNN and LSTM),  
optimization (linear programming, mix-integer programming, non-linear programming, etc.),  
advanced analytics, and experimentations (A/B testing, diff-in-diff, PSM) to solve complex business problems.  
 
Proficient in  
Python (including Numpy, Pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, etc.), 
R (including tidyverse, Shiny app, etc.),  
SQL, and Data Visualization tools (Tableau, Looker, etc.). 
 
A proven track record of leading cross-functional projects that result in significant cost savings and operational 
improvements. Skilled in designing robust data pipelines, developing models, and translating business needs into 
actionable data-driven strategies. 
 
 
EXPERIENCE 
Walmart

improvements. Skilled in designing robust data pipelines, developing models, and translating business needs into 
actionable data-driven strategies. 
 
 
EXPERIENCE 
Walmart 
Senior Data Scientist 
Seattle, WA 
09.2023-04.2024 
 
Implemented advanced operations research and machine learning methodologies to optimize business processes, 
achieving significant cost savings and operational efficiencies. 
• Pioneered a Decision Engine for importation strategy optimization, leading to multimillion-dollar savings and 
enhanced customer experience. 
• Engineered data pipelines for seamless data integration, enhancing data accuracy and accessibility for strategic 
decision-making. 
• Created a systematic location selection model, elevating logistics efficiency and yielding cost reduction. 
 
Zulily (Qurate Retail Group) 
Senior Data Scientist 
Seattle, WA 
12.2018-09.2023 
 
Led cross-functional projects to develop and implement optimization, simulation, statistical, and machine learning

Senior Data Scientist 
Seattle, WA 
12.2018-09.2023 
 
Led cross-functional projects to develop and implement optimization, simulation, statistical, and machine learning 
methods to address business challenges. Established analytical framework for QRG, leading to cost savings, 
heightened efficiency, and continuous improvement. 
• Designed optimization models for QVC inventory placement system and established executable inventory 
placement strategy, generating annual cost savings by USD 4 m and order-to-delivery reduction by 0.5 days. 
• Devised optimization models for inbound allocation to bin storage, fulfillment centers bin consolidation, etc., 
reducing replenishment efforts by 40%, and freeing bin storage by 20%. 
• Created forecast models for QVC call center, Zulily outbound budget and demand forecast with models’ 
accuracies >90% based on defined metrics. 
• Built classification models to identify inbound prioritization opportunities, generating annual savings by USD 1

accuracies >90% based on defined metrics. 
• Built classification models to identify inbound prioritization opportunities, generating annual savings by USD 1 
m, and reducing outbound on-time shipment miss by 15%. 
• Mentored scientists and analysts for analytical skills and models developing to win as a team.  
 
Volkswagen Group China 
Business Analyst 
Beijing, China 
12.2014-06.2017

Directed audits to uncover valuable business insights, pinpoint process inefficiencies, and develop improvement 
strategies across business functions. 
• Identified and facilitated the largest chargeback amount (USD 10 m) and achieved annual cost reduction of USD 
7 m by contributing to processes improvement.  
• Contributed to efficiency increase and quality improvement in various processes in addition to cost reduction.  
• Implemented data-driven audit approaches to enhance more comprehensive and convincing audit conclusions. 
 
Schlumberger China (SLB China) 
Supply Chain Analyst 
Tianjin, China 
06.2012-11.2014 
 
Implemented optimal inventory to balance high customer service level versus the cost. Delivered analytical and data-
driven insights to improve inventory management processes and reporting. 
• Enhanced demand forecast accuracy by 24% using data modeling and inventory management techniques.

driven insights to improve inventory management processes and reporting. 
• Enhanced demand forecast accuracy by 24% using data modeling and inventory management techniques. 
• Led cross-functional teams in the successful oversight of regional initiatives, including inventory buyback and 
process optimization, achieving successful deliverables such as a 20% improvement in inventory accuracy. 
• Improved service level by 30% through implementing daily inventory monitoring, periodical inventory report, 
lean process transformation aimed at pinpointing and addressing problem areas with effective corrective actions.
